title: 86/123/EEC: Council Decision of 8 April 1986 concerning the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters between the European Economic Community and the Government of Canada relating to the claim by the European Economic Community for compensation arising from the extension of quotas on imports into Canada of women' s and girls' footwear for the period 1 December 1985 to 30 November 1988
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 8 April 1986
concerning the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters between the European Economic Community and the Government of Canada relating to the claim by the European Economic Community for compensation arising from the extension of quotas on imports into Canada of women's and girls' footwear for the period 1 December 1985 to 30 November 1988
(86/123/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters between the European Economic Community and the Government of Canada relating to the claim by the European Economic Community for compensation arising from the extension of quotas on imports into Canada of women's and girls' footwear for the period 1 December 1985 to 30 November 1988 is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the person empowered to sign the Agreement in order to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 8 April 1986.
For the Council
The President
G.M.V. van AARDENNE
